description: Abuto Keiji is http://anidb.net/ch5901 [Kanae]`s manager for the http://anidb.net/ch40702 [I.J.F.Music Japan] organization. He is violent, possessive and keeps her a prisoner, mentally and physically. He is jealous of http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kyouta] for his powers and tries to separate him and http://anidb.net/ch5896 [Yoriko] for his own gain.
name: Abuto Keiji
